overview:
Dr. Michael Robinson is an experienced internet community executive with over fifteen years building companies, managing people, and launching new products. Prior to co-founding IceBreaker, Michael served in Corporate Development and Strategy at Microsoft, ran the Wireless product unit for the Windows group, and was named Entrepreneur in Residence. Prior to Microsoft, Michael was a manager with McKinsey & Co. in the Chicago, Chinese and South East Asia offices before co-founding renren Media, a publicly traded internet company and pioneer in the Chinese community space.

Source : IceBreaker.com
